message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000.
I'm interested in the product, but $9000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $7500 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $8200.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $8200 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $7000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
I understand that $7000 is still a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer it to you for $7800.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $7800 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $6800 for the product. Can you consider this price?
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $7200.
I understand that we're getting close to the end of our negotiation, but I'm still not comfortable with $7200. I'm willing to pay $6500 for the product. Can you consider this price?
I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, Bob. However, I'm still willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $7000.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $7000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $6200 for the product. This is my final offer.
